name: Sharkbody Abomination

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
text: The abomination has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Water Breathing
text: The abomination can breathe only underwater.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
text: The abomination can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

description: Source: Explorer's Guide to Wildemount p. 215
